column1: not a great start for the debutant. Fuller outside off and driven through extra cover
a bit of shape but down the leg side. Yet to bowl a legitimate delivery
four more but Dilbar won't mind that. A sharp bouncer hurries on to the Heazlett who was looking to pull but gets a top edge over the keeper's head
140.8kph. He's cranking it up, a single to third man
fuller outside off, 141 kph. Steered towards backward point
length ball around middle, flicked towards short midwicket for a couple
140.8kph. Length ball around off, cuts Cutting in half and goes through between bat and pad
length ball at the stumps, goes back and works it towards midwicket. Cutting slips while returning for the second
flatter around off, 94.2kph. Defended from the back foot
mistimes it over point. Fuller this time, Cutting creates some room and looks to go over extra cover, they come back for the third
flatter outside off, looks to force through extra cover. The ball hits the bottom part and runs past the keeper
pitched up again, goes down on one knee and sweeps it behind square leg. Back-to-back fours
92kph. Zampa has his man. A quicker one sliding across the left-hander. Heazlett was looking to pull it away, misses the ball crashes into the off stump
length ball outside off. Looks to steer it past the keeper but short third man is quite fan and makes a tumbling stop to his left
length ball around off, Cutting goes over mid-off this time, one-bounce four
and this one has gone over Handscomb. Length ball around off, Cutting looks to go big again but gets only a top edge that flies to the third man boundary
three fours in a row. Length ball on the pads, and flicked away towards the fine leg boundary
fuller on the stumps, moves across and pushes it towards long-on
length ball around off, drives it towards extra cover who fumbles
too full on the stumps, digs it out towards covers
90.7kph, length ball outside off, goes for the drive but ends up slicing it towards point
fuller on the stumps, drives inside out towards mid-off. Three dots
pitched up on the leg stump, drives it towards long-on for one
a diving stop by Maxwell to his right. Was fuller on the stumps, Cutting backed away and smashed it to the bowler's left, Maxwell was swift at mid-off
and again. Zampa is not giving any room to Cutting who creates some by moving away and smashes it down the ground. Another brilliant stop by Maxwell to his right. One bounce to him
length ball on the stumps, pushed back
length on middle and leg, swipes it behind square leg
flatter and shorter, clears the front leg and looks to go big, but doesn't get the timing right. A single in front of square leg
fuller on the stumps, pushed towards mid-on
dropped by Maxwell. Was a length ball, Cutting backs away and smashes it towards the bowler. A tough chance that doesn't stick
an inside edge onto the pads. A length ball around off, looks to run it down but too close
length but down the leg side, flicked past a diving Zampa at short fine leg
fuller outside off, backs away and muscles it through covers for another four
fuller on the stumps, clears his front leg and hits it towards long-on
a full toss down the leg side, gets lucky as Cutting fails to get any bat on it
fuller and a hint of inward movement, flicked towards short midwicket
fuller around off, comes forward and drives it towards long-on
fuller around off and swinging in. Cutting looks to dig it out but gets an inside edge into the ground
length ball around off, looks to push on the off side, inner half of the bat and rolls towards the bowler
makes room and flat-bats this length ball towards long-off
fuller outside off, cuts it past a diving backward point
79kph, fuller outside off, sweeps it towards deep midwicket, all along the ground
slower again, length ball around off, chops it towards cover-point
87.8kph. Change of pace. A length ball outside off and spinning away. Looks to drive and gets beaten
length ball on the stumps, goes deep and pushes it towards long-on
short of length outside off, finds backward point with the cut
length around off, punched towards extra cover
flatter and quicker around off and middle, mistimes the pull towards long-on

and an easy catch for Maddinson at long-off. Fuller around off, a touch slower this time. Cutting looks to hit it down the ground but doesn't get the elevation. Maddinson pouches it while squatting down
fuller outside off, steers it towards deep point
length ball around off, guides it towards short third man, Lynn was quick to spot the single
length ball around off, punches it back towards the bowler
length outside off, goes for the cut but doesn't get the placement right. Extra cover cuts it off
length outside off and spinning away, cuts it towards the sweeper cover
a googly, length ball on the stumps and spinning in, de Villiers misses the flick and is struck on the pads. A mild appeal for lbw but it was heading down
a quick single. Length ball around off, nudges it towards point and sets off, Lynn was slow off his blocks but just makes it in the end. An easy decision for third umpire
length ball outside off, looks to push at it and gets beaten
length ball outside off, pulls it to the right of long-on
112kph. Slower one, a length ball outside off, pulls it towards deep midwicket
length outside off, goes for the whip but it's too full for that. Mistimes it towards backward square leg
a low full toss around off, hits it hard and straight and over the bowler's head. Gets a boundary
another slower one, 113.6kph. Slaps it towards deep midwicket
dropped short and pulled away over wide long-on, all the way for a six
tucked away towards deep midwicket for a couple of runs more
length ball around off, punched towards extra cover
a touch fuller on the leg stump, mistimes the slog to deep backward square leg
fuller on the leg stump, drives it inside out towards mid-off
length outside off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
length outside off, cuts it behind point for a couple. They come back for the second
short one outside off but Lynn cuts it straight towards backward point
short of length around off, goes back and pulls it in front of square leg, Larkin runs to his left from deep square leg, puts in the dive and pouhces it with both hands. Brilliant
length ball around off and spinning away, de Villiers adjusts and pushes it towards point
fuller on the pads, flicked towards deep midwicket
length ball outside off, pushes at it, gets an outside edge that goes past the keeper
length ball on the stumps, defends it on the leg side
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards short fine leg
length ball around off, punched towards long-off
length ball around off, flicked in front of square leg
length ball around off, whipped towards midwicket
length ball around off, goes back and punches it towards deep extra cover
a googly on middle and leg, comes forward and defends it on the off side
another googly, a touch fuller this time. Renshaw was looking to flick on the leg side, gets an outside edge towards point
length outside off, cuts it towards deep point. Once again only a single for de Villiers
googly again, opens the face at the last movement to guide it towards backward point
fuller outside off, looks to go aerial but it's away from de Villiers. Mistimes it aerially towards long-off. Lamichhane will have to wait for his 100th T20 wicket
length outside off, goes back and punches it over the cover area for his first boundary
fuller on the stumps, drilled back towards the bowler who makes a partial stop to prevent any runs
six off the back foot, over long-off. Was a length ball around off, de Villiers once again transferred his weight and lifted it up and over
a half-tracker, looked like it slipped from the hand. De Villiers rocks back and smashes it over deep midwicket, this is turning out to be a big over
length ball outside off, punches it towards sweeper cover
a low full toss outside off, hits it along the ground for a single to long-off
length ball outside off, Renshaw skips down and looks to go over the bowler's head. Misses it altogether and an easy stumping for Gotch
fuller on the stumps, flicked towards deep midwicket
Flatter, length ball on the stumps, de Villiers goes back and pulls it over deep midwicket
too full outside off, digs it out towards deep extra cover
a googly around off, goes for the flick but not sure if he was in full control, a single to fine leg
fuller around off, digs it towards the left of long-off, and they hare back for the second
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards midwicket
length ball just outside leg, moves across and looks to scoop it fine. Gets four leg byes nonetheless
uses his feet to push it inside out towards wide long-off
fuller on the stumps, stays back and lofts it over the bowler's head, his fourth six of the night
short on the stumps, de Villiers pulls it off the back foot but doesn't quite get hold of it. Lands to the left of deep midwicket. One bounce four to get to his fifty
102.9kph. Flatter and quicker on the stumps, flicked towards deep midwicket
length ball outside off, slaps it towards extra cover where the fielder fumbles and allows a couple
a yorker outside off, digs it towards extra cover, de Villiers was looking for a single but the fielder was quick to the ball
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards long-on. A direct hit from Maxwell but Labuschagne was in well before that
140.8kph. Length ball at the stumps, goes for the pull but it hurries on to de Villiers, the bottom hand comes off. A single to wide mid-on
another short one. Quick, not letting the batsman line him up, another mistimed pull towards mid-on
too full this time, in the slot for de Villiers who smokes it over the bowler's head for huuuuge six
length ball outside off, drags it towards long-on
follows the batsman who was backing away. A low full toss pushed towards long-on
length ball at the batsman, backs away and forehands it towards deep midwicket
length ball angling in, pulls it towards long-on where Maxwell is quick enough to prevent the second runs
length ball at the batsman, not that short but de Villiers goes for the pull. The bottom hand comes off as it lands towards midwicket. They scamper for two
looks to reverse scoop this time but Coulter-Nile adjusts and bowls it wide outside off, de Villiers slips while trying to reach there. No connection in the end
fuller on the leg stump, Labuschagne backs away and smashes this slower one over long-on
length but down the leg side, pulls it over fine leg for six more
length ball outside off, flat-bats it straight, de Villiers had to take evasive action
fuller on the toes, clipped towards deep midwicket for a couple
a low full toss on the pads and de Villiers has just flicked it over deep midwicket, excellent timing
fuller but down the leg side and going further away

114.6kph. First wicket for Hussain in the BBL but it came too late. Fuller on the stumps, de Villiers looked to go over the bowler's head. However he ends up skying the slower one towards mid-off where Maddinson settles under it
length ball on the pads and whipped away, and it just keeps going away from the man at deep square leg who looks to cut the angle but cannot reach there in time
fuller outside off, smashes parallel to the ground. On the half-volley to mid-off
tucked away behind square leg for a couple
short and pulled wide of long-on this time, four more to Stoinis
length ball angling around off, stays back and punches it towards mid-off
fuller on the pads and lofted towards midwicket, hits the boundary line on the full, 16 from the over
length ball sliding down the leg side, brushes the thigh pad on its way to the keeper, an appeal for caught-behind but not out
length ball on the pads, looks to tuck it away behind square leg, off the thigh pad and they collect two leg-byes as the fielder slips there
more extras there. Once again on the leg stump, Gotch looks to flick it fine but it brushes the thigh pad once more and goes between the keeper and short fine leg
length but room outside off this time, a bit of shape away as well. Gotch hits it to the left of the cover fielder
short of length but down the leg side, de Villiers dives to his left and gets a hand to it. More freebies for the Stars
short of length around off, looks to push at it, The ball hits the outer half towards short third man
length ball at the batsman, Stoinis goes back and defends it down the ground
length but down the leg side, was a googly. One more extra to the total
length outside off, goes for the sweep but misses. Struck on the pads outside the line of the off stump
a googly from off and middle, goes back but it spins big on him, defends it towards cover
googly again, cramping the batsman who trying to create room, defended back
length ball down the leg side, flicked towards backward square leg
length ball spinning on the pads, misses the flick and is hit on the pad
another googly around off, punched towards long-on from the back foot
141.4kph, fuller around off, Stoinis looks to go over mid-off but ends up chipping it tamely. An easy catch for Laughlin, a big wicket for the Heat
fuller on the stumps, drives it towards mid-on, Lynn is quick to the ball and hits the stumps direct. Gotch was in though
fuller around off, hit it towards Lynn's left once again and they take the single this time
length ball around off, gets behind it and blocks
chopped on! Length ball around off, Gotch was looking to run it down the third man but ends up playing it back on to his stumps. Both Star openers are back in the pavilion
140.7kph. Length ball on middle and leg, defends it on the on side
tossed up outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards point
a googly around off, looks to work on the leg side, luckily gets an inside edge on to the back pad
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards backward square leg, Handscomb dives full length to complete the second
length ball around off, carrom ball this time, defended from the back foot
length ball on the stumps, goes for the sweep but misses. They run a single to square leg
length around off, looks to force it through extra cover with his hands, gets an inside edge on to the pads
length ball at the stumps, stays back and blocks
uses the pace of the bowler. This was bowled at 142kph. Length ball on the stumps, Handscomb moves across and flicks it between the keeper and short fine leg
length ball on the stumps, Handscomb was backing up, perhaps expecting a fuller one. Pushes it towards point in the end
slower length ball around off, 119.3kph, moves across and flicks it towards square leg
fuller on the stumps and flicked to the right of mid-on for the second boundary of the over
length ball around off, uses his wrist to flick it behind square leg. Was in the air but well short of the fielder in the deep
short of length around off, goes back and cuts it towards sweeper cover
flatter, angling on to the pads, misses the flick. An appeal for lbw but was heading down
length ball around off, goes back and flicks it towards deep backward square leg
length ball around off, goes back and hits it towards long-off
down the track and launches it over the bowler's head for a big six
short of length around off, pulls it towards long-on
starts with a slower one on the leg stumps, Handscomb looks to go aerial towards long-on. Fails to connect and is struck on the pads
tucked away towards midwicket and they are taking on Labuschagne who sprints in and aims at the stump on the non-striker's. A direct hit and Larkin was gone
length ball outside off, steered towards backward point
length ball on the stumps, stays back and flicks it in front of square leg
length ball at the stumps, Handscomb dances down and hits it dead straight for his second six of the innings
length ball at the stumps, swats it towards deep midwicket

length ball outside off, goes for the sweep, gets a top edge over the keeper's head. Short fine leg comes across to field. Handscomb is coming back for the second but de Villiers collects the throw and whips off the bails. Even a full length dive doesn't help Handscomb
length ball around off, nudges it towards long-on to get off the mark
length ball on middle and leg, flicked towards deep midwicket
the danger man is gone. Length ball at the stumps, keeps a touch low and that Maxwell was looking to play on the back foot doesn't help him. Fails to connect the punch and is bowled
fuller outside off, pushes it towards cover
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards square leg
short of length around off, goes back and defends
short of length around off, goes for the cut but too close, chops it towards point
fuller on the stumps, a cutter. Defended on the off side
short of length around off, drops it towards covers
slower one, length ball around off, looks to drop on the leg side and run. Laughlin is quick to the ball
short of length around off, dabs it towards third man
dropped short, rocks back and pulls it over deep midwicket for a six. The Stars need more of that
fuller on the stumps, digs it out back towards the bowler
fuller and wider outside off, looks to go over the bowler's head but mistimes it towards long-off, Renshaw settles under
length ball around off, goes back and cuts it towards backward point
length ball around off, goes back and defends it on the leg side
length ball around off, mistimes the punch towards long-on, was looking to go towards extra cover

fuller outside off, cuts it towards backward point, Coulter-Nile took off and was halfway down before Larkin sent him back. It's a weak throw, Mujeeb collects it in front of the stumps and breaks the stumps, Coulter-Nile puts in the dive. Looks like he made it but replays show the bat was perhaps in the air. The third umpire thinks otherwise and rules it not out
length ball around off, cuts it towards backward point for a quick single
90.6kph. A googly from Mujeeb. A length ball around off and middle, Coulter-Nile looks to defend, bat-pad and it lobs towards short leg, de Villiers moves swiftly and takes a tumbling catch
length ball on the pads, looks to flick but misses
fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
a googly around off, lunges forward and turns it towards square leg
length ball around off, spinning away, goes for the cut, was in the air but just away from Lynn, who dives to his right at short third man and makes a one-handed stop
length ball on the stumps, flicked towards deep square leg
fuller around off and smashes over the bowler's head
length outside off, cuts it past backward point for a couple
fuller on the stumps, goes for the slog sweep and misses. The ball clatters on to the leg stump, Swepson picks up his third
fuller but down the leg side, a good take by de Villiers behind the stumps
a googly on the stumps, goes back and flicks it towards midwicket
fuller around off, pushes it towards short midwicket
a googly, looks to back away and push on the off side, gets beaten
a googly on the stumps, goes back and punches it towards short midwicket

length ball outside off, skips down and looks to go straight, misses. But de Villiers fumbles and drops the ball before picking it up and breaking the stumps. Has he recovered in time? Yes, but because Zampa wasn't quick enough to get back
length ball at the stumps, goes back and cuts it towards extra cover
length ball around off, looks to hit it in the air but doesn't middle. Bounces towards long-off
bamboozles Lamichhane with the slower one. Was a length ball around off, the batsman was way too early into the shot. Checks the shot and ends up lobbing it in the air. An easy catch for Laughlin
another slower one, fuller on the stumps, pushes it towards mid-on
fuller around off, pushes it towards long-on
fuller around off, just gets his bat on it as he looks to defend. A thick outside edge towards short third man
slower, fuller outside off, pushes it towards point
length ball on the stumps, chips it towards midwicket
slower length ball outside off, guides it towards backward point
a high full toss outside off, slashes it towards deep point
fuller but way down the leg side
slower length ball outside off, adjusts well to steer it towards third man
length but way outside off, reaches out and cuts it towards extra cover
fuller at the stumps, comes forward and blocks
a low full toss outside off, lobs it over mid-on for a couple
slower length ball outside off, guides it towards backward point
fuller around off, hits it towards the bowler who sticks his right hand out and makes the stop
a bouncer but down the leg side, too high also
another short one, backs away and pulls it towards deep midwicket
length ball around off, taps it towards extra cover
a full toss, 109.3kph, hits it towards midwicket for one more
fuller around off, steered into the covers
fuller on the stumps, works it towards deep midwicket
length ball outside off, backs away and cuts it over extra cover, a desperate chase and dive by Labuschagne to stop it just inside
length ball but down the leg side, they get a leg-bye to square leg

brilliant catch by Laughin, pedalling back to his left from mid-on and timing his jump perfectly to take it both hands. Was a slower length ball outside off that Hussain dragged with the toe end of the bat
